project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program to perform data analysis on a CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numeric columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement the functionality to read a CSV file
Implement the functionality to calculate the mean for specified numeric columns
Implement the functionality to calculate the median for specified numeric columns
Implement the functionality to calculate the mode for specified numeric columns
Collect user input for selecting numeric columns from the CSV file
Write tests for the implemented functions (mean, median, mode calculations and CSV reading)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
